ps1.6:1.1: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:1.2: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇasampayutte katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:1.3: Rūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:1.4: Arūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:2.1: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:2.2: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:2.3: Rūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:2.4: Arūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:3.1: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:4.1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo jīvitasaṅkhārā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.6: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.7: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcindriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.8: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.9: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca viññāṇañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.10: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.11: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime aṭṭhavīsati dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:4.12: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte imesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:5.1: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:6.1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo jīvitasaṅkhārā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.6: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.7: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcindriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.8: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.9: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca viññāṇañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.10: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.11: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime aṭṭhavīsati dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:6.12: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇasampayutte imesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:7.1: Rūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ katamesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:7.3: rūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ imesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:8.1: Arūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ katamesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:9.1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:9.2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcindriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:9.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:9.4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca viññāṇañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:9.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:9.6: Arūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ imesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:10.1: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:10.2: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇavippayutte katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:11.1: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte channaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:11.2: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇavippayutte channaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:12.1: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte katamesaṁ channaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:13.1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo jīvitasaṅkhārā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.6: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.7: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāri indriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.8: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.9: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca viññāṇañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.10: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime dvādasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.11: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime chabbīsati dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.6:13.12: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte imesaṁ channaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:14.1: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇavippayutte katamesaṁ channaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:14.6: khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇavippayutte imesaṁ channaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti.
